entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Temiscouata
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:04 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow late in the evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
